alert.note: Alert for Macomb (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 27 at 6:23AM EST until January 27 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Detroit/Pontiac MI has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Michigan... North Branch Clinton Near Mt Clemens affecting Macomb County. For the N.br. Clinton River...including Mt Clemens...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...North Branch Clinton near Mt Clemens. * WHEN...From this morning to this evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 AM EST Saturday the stage was 15.1 feet. - Forecast...The river will crest today and likely fall back below flood stage by tonight. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=DTX. The next statement will be issued this evening at 630 PM EST.
